data.name: EmphasisMark
desc: These constants control the automatic rendering of emphasis marks.
These constants control the automatic rendering of emphasis marks for a given font.

items.name: DOT_ABOVE
lines: Automatic emphasis marks as dots above the glyphs.

items.name: DOT_BELOW
lines: Automatic emphasis marks as dots below the glyphs.

items.name: CIRCLE_ABOVE
lines: Automatic emphasis marks as circles (unfilled outlines) above the glyphs.

items.name: CIRCLE_BELOW
lines: Automatic emphasis marks as circles (unfilled outlines) below the glyphs.

items.name: DISC_ABOVE
lines: Automatic emphasis marks as discs (filled circles) above the glyphs.

items.name: DISC_BELOW
lines: Automatic emphasis marks as discs (filled circles) below the glyphs.

items.name: ACCENT_ABOVE
lines: Automatic emphasis marks as accent marks above the glyphs.

items.name: ACCENT_BELOW
lines: Automatic emphasis marks as accent marks below the glyphs.
